name: Oinkologne ♀
description: The Hog Pokémon. This is a meticulous Pokémon that likes to keep things tidy. It shrouds itself in a floral aroma that soothes the Pokémon around it.

abilities.name: Aroma Veil
abilities.description: Any ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon automatically passes any WIS save they are required to make.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: This Pokemon takes half the damage it otherwise would from Ice and Fire damage.
